<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 3"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Ring of Torag](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1734)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Crown of the Kobold King</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Crown of the Kobold King](/Sources.aspx?ID=148) pg. 116

**Price** 60 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This simple golden ring has a large, red gemstone set into it that sparkles with an inner fire.

**Activate** <actions string="Single Action" /> Interact;  **Frequency** once per round;  **Requirements** You're taking [persistent fire damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29); **Effect** You call upon the ring to put out the flame and its magic attempts to bring the fire under control. This is especially effective assistance against persistent fire damage, so you gain an immediate flat check to remove the persistent fire damage, and the DC typically decreases from 15 to 10.

**Activate** <actions string="Reaction" /> envision;  **Frequency** once per day; **Trigger** You're targeted by a [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72) effect;  **Effect** The ring's red gemstone flashes with light, granting you resistance 5 against fire and a +1 status bonus on your AC or saving throw against the fire effect targeting you; these benefits end as soon as the fire effect is resolved.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
